column4: can you pastebin exactly what you type (no passwords, of course) and the error message, then share the link?
its only "Permission denied, please try again."
what are you typing in - literally?
feel free to anonymize the user/host
ssh user@host      then the password      then the error
do you have any other access to the server?
usr13 root also does not work
your server? or administered by someone else?
I know you feel certain that you're logging into the correct server, but I suspect it's the wrong one
usr13 i only added me to the vboxusr group nothing else.
okay - so you have console access through VirtualBox?
no it was only for usb access
(repeating myself here, but) is this server administered by someone you can get help from? or is it yours?
it's a virtualized server on VirtualBox, no?
no this was only i hint that i changed anytzhing in the group settings for virtual box
note that it is not GNOME 2 - GNOME Shell is actually quite similar to Unity in many ways - fans of GNOME 2 are kind of left out in the cold by the major distros from here on it seems ;-)
